code:
#Start code here
from turtle import *
turtle = Turtle()
screen = Screen()
screen.bgcolor(227, 226, 171)
turtle.pencolor(0, 0, 255)
turtle.forward(60)
turtle.left(90)
turtle.forward(60)
turtle.left(90)
turtle.forward(60)
turtle.left(90)
turtle.forward(60)
turtle.penup()
turtle.left(180)
turtle.forward(60)
turtle.pencolor(255, 0, 0)
turtle.pendown()
turtle.right(30)
turtle.forward(60)
turtle.right(120)
turtle.forward(60)
